12.content: Ah, Chuckie. Redhead, scared of just about everything, poor guy. So, what happens to him?
12.title: Chuckie Finster

121.content:
Chaz puts Chuckie to bed, he walks over to his favorite night light and flicks it on making sure his son doesn't get scared of the Dark.

"There we go, you've got nothing to be afraid of" He organized Chuckies duvet making him more comfortable than ever. He kisses the top of Chuckies forehead and heads towards the door

"Sweet dreams little one" gently closing the door Chaz heads downstairs while Chuckie shuts his eyes and goes to sleep. Shining in the corner of his room was the night light and through his window was a full moon beaming brighter than ever, which made it difficult for Chuckie, tossing and turning each side of the bed. Then it happened, Chuckie froze like a deer in the headlights, warm, wet urine flow through his trousers leaving a massive wet patch right in front of his PJs

"Oh no! Not again!" cried Chuckie feeling ashamed, embarrassed, horrified by what has happened. He quickly jumped out of his bed and head for the door to tell his daddy, but each step of the way Chuckie started to shrink in size. Was what Phil and Lil said was true? Is Chuckie turning into a baby baby? At first, it sounded like some weird superstition through horror shows and nursery rhymes, but sadly what Phil said was true.

Chuckies transformation had begun, his hair started to fall out only leaving small strands of it, what was left of the remains scattered across the bedroom floor. His two front teeth vanished into his gums, all those times he had eaten peanut butter and jelly sandwiches were over, from now on he'll be eating soft mush from a jar. His legs gave up on him, in a fast reaction Chuckie pushed his hands out in front of him leaving him in a crawling position, though he tried to get back up it was hopeless all of his muscles have shut down, he has to start all over again when he reaches the age of two.
121.title: He somehow becomes a baby-baby again.

1523232.content: Will she make a bet with Susie that she can be nice to the babies for one day?
1523232.title: Something else

15232321.content:
Angelica Pickles hated babies, and she hated how she had to spend most of her time around them. She hated how loud they were, she hated how drooly and grabby they were, but what she hated most about them is the fact that they wore diapers, and used them whenever they needed to pee or poop. She hated the smell of dirty diapers, and she hated how sometimes she had to wait for one of the grown-ups to change the babies' diapers.

One day, Angelica had invited her best friend, Susie Carmichael over to play with her. The two girls were playing with Angelica's Cynthia toys and having a good time, when all of a sudden, Charlotte came into the room.

"Guess what, Angelica? It's your father's and my turn to babysit today, so Tommy and his friends are coming over to play later." Charlotte told Angelica, who was horrified.

"But... but..." Angelica said nervously.

"I knew you'd be excited!" Charlotte said, and she left the room.

"Oh, I hate those dumb babies!" Angelica said as soon as Charlotte was out of earshot. She was not looking forward to having to spend another day with her baby cousin and his friends. Susie, on the other hand, was friends with the babies and wished Angelica would be nice to them like she was.

"Face it, Angelica, you couldn't be nice to the babies even for one day!" Susie told Angelica.

"I can, too!" insisted Angelica.

"Prove it! If you can be nice to the babies for just one day, I'll wear a diaper!" Susie told Angelica. Angelica liked this idea, as the thought of Susie wearing a diaper was humorous to her.

"You got a deal, Susie!" Angelica told Susie.

"Not so fast, Angelica! If I catch you being mean to the babies, then you have to wear a diaper!" Susie told Angelica.

Does Angelica go with Susie's bet?
15232321.title: Yes

choices: Tommy and His Friends Come Over
152323211.content:
Angelica probably should have refused the bet and saved herself a lot of humiliation, but she couldn't resist the idea of Susie wearing a diaper, and she was determined to win.

"Okay, Susie! You got yourself a deal!" Angelica said, and she and Susie shook hands.

What happens next?
152323211.title: Yes

1523232111.content:
Just then, the doorbell rang.

"I'll get it!" Charlotte said, and she walked up to her front door.

Tommy had arrived with his friends, but did both of his parents drop them off or just one?
1523232111.title: Tommy and His Friends Come Over

15232321112.content: Who dropped Tommy and his friends off?
15232321112.title: Just One

152323211122.content:
Stu was at the door. He was carrying Tommy and Dil in his arms, and he also had Chuckie, Kimi, Phil, and Lil walking alongside him.

"Hi, Charlotte. Thanks for watching Tommy and his friends today. Didi and I both have a lot of work to do." Stu told Charlotte as he went inside her house, with Chuckie, Kimi, Phil, and Lil following behind him.

"Oh, it's no problem, Stu. You know Tommy and his friends are always welcome here." Charlotte told Stu as he set Tommy and Dil down near Susie and Angelica.

"Bye, Champ. Daddy will be back later. Be a good boy for your Aunt Charlotte, Uncle Drew and Cousin Angelica." Stu told Tommy as he pet his head. Tommy giggled, and Stu left to head back to his house.

"Hi, Susie! Hi, Angelica!" Tommy said as he greeted the girls.

"Hi, Tommy. Very nice to see you here." Angelica said with a forced smile and her teeth clenched.

"Um, Susie, is something wrong with Angelica?" Tommy asked Susie.

Does Susie tell Tommy about the bet she and Angelica made?
152323211122.title: Stu

1523232111221.content:
"Angelica and I made a bet today. I bet her that if she could be nice to you for a day, I'd wear a diaper!" Susie told Tommy. Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, Lil, and Kimi all gasped upon hearing this.

"Susie, why would you do something like that?" Chuckie asked Susie.

"Because if I caught Angelica being mean to you, she'd lose the bet and have to wear a diaper instead!" Susie told Chuckie. The babies all had to admit that the idea of Angelica wearing a diaper was pretty humorous.

Do the babies assist Susie in her plan?
1523232111221.title: Yes

choices: "Could we please play with your toys?"
15232321112211.content:
"Well, maybe we can help you win the bet." Tommy told Susie.

"You can?" said Susie.

"Of course we will. You're our friend." Chuckie told Susie.

"Oh, thank you!" Susie said to the babies.

What do the babies ask Angelica?
15232321112211.title: Yes

152323211122111.content:
"Um, Angelica, could we please play with your toys?" Tommy asked Angelica. Angelica was shocked when she heard this. She wasn't sure what to do. She didn't want the babies to play with her toys, but she also didn't want to lose the bet and have to wear a diaper.

Does Angelica let the babies play with her toys?
152323211122111.title: "Could we please play with your toys?"

1523232111221111.content:
"Sure, Tommy. You and your friends can play with any toys you want." Angelica said with a forced smile and her teeth clenched.

"Thanks, Angelica!" said Tommy.

"Yeah, thanks, Angelica!" said the other babies.

What happens next?
1523232111221111.title: Yes

15232321112211111.content: Did one of the babies accidentally break one of Angelica's toys?
15232321112211111.title: Reader's Choice 1

1523232111221111111.content:
Chuckie accidentally stepped on Angelica's Cynthia airplane and broke it in half. Tommy gasped when he saw this.

"Sorry, Angelica." Chuckie said as he handed Angelica the broken airplane.

Does Angelica lose her temper and yell at Chuckie?
1523232111221111111.title: Yes

15232321112211111111.content:
Angelica lost her temper and yelled at Chuckie.

"You dumb baby! Look what you've done to my Cynthia airplane!" shouted Angelica. She suddenly gasped and covered her mouth.

"Sorry, Angelica, but you remember our deal. You were mean to the babies, and now you have to wear a diaper." Susie told Angelica, who groaned unhappily.

Whose diaper bag did Susie get a clean diaper from to diaper Angelica with?
15232321112211111111.title: Yes

152323211122111111111.content:

1523232111221111111111.content:
"Sure, Susie." Kimi told Susie, and she handed her a clean diaper from her diaper bag.

"Thanks, Kimi." Susie told Kimi.

"Okay, Angelica. Let's get your diaper on!" Susie told Angelica.

Did Angelica let Susie put Kimi's diaper on her bottom?
1523232111221111111111.title: Yes

15232321112211111111112.content:
Angelica wasn't going to let Susie put Kimi's diaper on her so easily.

15232321112211111111112.title: No

152323211122111111111121.content:
"Get her!" Susie said to the babies.

152323211122111111111121.title: Yes

1523232111221111111111211.content:
It took five babies to hold Angelica down. Kimi held Angelica's hair, Tommy and Chuckie each held Angelica's arms, and Phil and Lil each held Angelica's legs.

"Let go of me, you dumb babies!" shouted Angelica.

"Not until we put your diaper on!" Susie reminded Angelica.

Now that Angelica was held down, was Susie able to get Kimi's diaper onto her bottom?
1523232111221111111111211.title: Yes

15232321112211111111112111.content:
As Angelica was held down, Susie pulled down Angelica's tights and panties.

Did Susie powder Angelica's bottom before taping Kimi's diaper onto it?
15232321112211111111112111.title: Yes

15532.title: Someone else

info.brief_description: Join Tommy Pickles and his friends as they adventure into many parts of their Universe.
info.description:
The Rugrats as babies are onto many adventures in their backyard and many places like Paris, How do they feel about meeting the Thornberry family again or something else, Like a transformation?

Rules:

1. The Rugrats are babies.
2. No anime crossovers.
3. Any Type of Transformation is allowed, Except age progression.
4. Anywhere around the world is perfect for The Rugrats to go to.
5. Excellent Grammar and Spelling and more then just one sentence.
6. The Rugrats needing diapie changes are allowed or being potty trained.
7. The Interactive is For More then Just TFs and Crossovers, it is home to many things.
8. Strange things can happen as well.
9. No Violence or any thing that is wrong.
10. Diaper Using or wetting are welcomed.
11. Have fun!
info.pretty_title: The Rugrats Interactive of many things
